translations: n.传真机；复印本（facsimile 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Yet it has always been possible to make very accurate facsimiles of pretty well any fine art work.
sentences.translation: 然而，一直以来，任何美术作品都可以做出非常准确的摹本。

sentences.sentence: Assignments in early quartos and First Folio texts will use Internet texts and facsimiles.
sentences.translation: 早期的四开本和首页对折文章的作业将使用因特网正文和传真。
